name: The Passing (08Alchemist)
description:
The Passing is an early prototype for a 2D Metroidvania style platformer. The game is heavily inspired by the likes of castlevania, Metroid, Hollow Knight, Shovel Knights and a number of other 2D platformers.

The Game has the player take on the role of a spirit trapped in the underworld who must treverse their way through the dangers to escape and pass on to the next life. 

The Passing was produced by a team of four students: Samad Hassan, Rosie Kiernan, Taha Almehdi and Michael Noonan.

Although this is only an early prototype we appreciate any and all feedback.
